item.title: Museum
item.description: British Museum, London Popular museum in the heart of London enabled virtual mode for tourists [Guggenheim Museum, New York] (https://artsandculture.google.com/streetview/solomon-r-guggenheim-museum-interior-streetview/jAHfbv3JGM2KaQ?hl=en&sv_lng=-73.95902634325634&sv_lat=40.78285751667664&sv_h=30.75703204567916&sv_p=0.06928383072430222&sv_pid=MfnUmHRyOSzMtY3vtYU05g&sv_z=0.9645743015259166) Check out Guggenheim’s well knownm spiral staircase National Gallery of Art, Washington, D.C. Exhibit of American fashion Renderings of clothes from historic eras Works of painter Johannes Vermeer Musée d’Orsay, Paris Work of famous French artists Art works of Monet, Cézanne, etc National Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art, Seoul
